name: Sage Minimum Rank Library
body:
### Minimum Rank Sage Library

See the [example Sage worksheet](http://sage.cs.drake.edu/home/pub/66/) for an example of how to load and use this library in Sage.  In particular, the following code in a Sage notebook cell will load this library without needing to explicitly download anything.

```python
URL='http://github.com/jasongrout/minimum_rank/raw/minimum_rank_1_1_1/'
files=['Zq_c.pyx','Zq.py','zero_forcing_64.pyx','zero_forcing_wavefront.pyx','minrank.py']
for f in files:
    load(URL+f)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
